Hello All,

I'm as new to this maling list as I am to the art of sword appreciation, 
however, I was on ebay and I noticed this tanto:

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=2195336016&category=43338

I hope this link works, but apparently this is a Naotsuna is one of the very 
famous Masamune Juttetsu. My understanding is that Masamune is a really 
famous smith, and all his works are national treasures, so I assume his 
disciples work would be as well. This blade on ebay, is there a 
characteristic that makes it so valuable? The type of hamon or the etched 
designs? I'm trying to appreciate this blade but don't know where to look. 
Could someone give me a few pointers??

Thanks,
Robert (japanese sword appreciation guy in training)
